required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Acute Appendicitis in Foreign Workers of Northern Israel
clinical_study.official_title: Acute Appendicitis in Foreign Workers of Northern Israel: a Retrospective Cohort Study

brief_summary.textblock: To Compare the outcome to acute appendicitis in foreign workers to the native patients.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a retrospective case-control study. The investigators identified all patients aged 18-50 who were admitted to our institution between January 1st, 2013 and October 31st, 2018, with the diagnosis of acute appendicitis. The study group included all foreign workers and the control group was age, sex, and co-morbidities matched group from the local population. The investigators compared time to presentation, admission parameters and disease outcomes.

primary_outcome.description: amount of cases defined as complicated acute appendicitis

arm_group.description: Foreign workers aged 18-50 who were admitted to our institution between January 1st, 2013 and October 31st, 2018, with the diagnosis of acute appendicitis.
Local patients aged 18-50 who were admitted to our institution between January 1st, 2013 and October 31st, 2018, with the diagnosis of acute appendicitis.

intervention.description: Laparoscopic appendectomy performed for acute appendicitis

study_pop.textblock: Patients aged 18-50 who were admitted to our institution between January 1st, 2013 and October 31st, 2018, with the diagnosis of acute appendicitis

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patients aged 18-50 who were admitted to our institution between January 1st, 2013 and October 31st, 2018, with the diagnosis of acute appendicitis
Exclusion Criteria:
- Pregnant women
- Patient whose pathology report of the appendix was normal

responsible_party.investigator_title: Acting head of bariatri center, Head of GEJ surgical unit
